mapper.select: SELECT A.PAY_DATE, C.PRO_NAME, C.PRO_USE_PERIOD, C.PRO_USE_COUNT, A.PAY_AMOUNT, B.ORD_MEMBER_ID, B.ORD_TRN_ID, D.MEMBER_NAME ORD_MEMBER_NAME, E.MEMBER_NAME ORD_TRN_NAME FROM TBL_PAYMENT A JOIN TBL_ORDER B ON(A.PAY_ORD_NO = B.ORD_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT C ON (B.ORD_PRO_NO = C.PRO_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON(B.ORD_MEMBER_ID = D.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(B.ORD_TRN_ID = E.MEMBER_ID) WHERE B.ORD_MEMBER_ID = #{ userId } ORDER BY A.PAY_NO DESC
